name: apostrophe-instagram
description: Adds an Instagram widget to the Apostrophe content management system
readme: # apostrophe-instagram [![NPM](https://nodei.co/npm/apostrophe-instagram.png?downloads=true&stars=true)](https://nodei.co/npm/apostrophe-instagram/) apostrophe-instagram is a widget for the [Apostrophe](http://github.com/punkave/apostrophe) content management system. Apostrophe Instagram lets you display a feed of images from a users Instagram feed. ## TO-DO - [ ] Build it - [ ] Publish to NPM - [ ] Build some nice basic styles - [ ] Write some tests?
